c74object.name: macaddress
c74object.digest: Return the MAC address of any wireless interface
c74object.description: macaddress is an object for obtaining the MAC address of any wireless interface to provide a unique identifier for the host computer.

objarg.name: interface-type
objarg.description:
The first argument sets the interface type for macaddress.
The options are:
any
wifi
ethernet
or the name of a network type

method.name: bang
method.description: A bang will cause macaddress to output the MAC address.

method.name: set
method.description:
The set message followed by a message will change the interface type and bang an output.
The options are:
set any
set wifi
set ethernet
or set the name of a network type
